title: How does Hunter X Hunter actually define a hunter? - Quora

response.answer_text: I don’t know what you specifically meant by that. But I think what defines a hunter is their capabilities to be one. Not just in terms of abilities but in terms of responsibilities to be a hunter. A license is not really necessary, take Kite for instance, he isn’t a hunter however he’s way better than many hunters themselves. Hunters have a broad field they could belong to but their main purpose is to explore unknown things such as the rare beast, hidden treasures, undiscovered places, old ruins or whatever that is as long as it’s worth hunting for.

in hunter x hunter , a hunter basically means like a one who hunts criminals , or saves other in any threats coming. it can be anything , they work as an allrounder. at the intro of hunter x hunter , you get to know that , some people are drawn towards magic and they are known as hunter , they hunt exotic creature , explore the world , basically everything. The magic mentioned in the intro is Nen , which people rarely know about , this makes a hunter different from others.
